attributes.text: Defines the methods neede by every marshaler which should work with the qooxdoo data stores.
The object for which classes should be created.
Whether the model should support the bubbling of change events or not.

Creates for the given data the needed classes. The classes contain for every key in the data a property. The classname is always the prefix qx.data.model. Two objects containing the same keys will not create two different classes.
The object for which models should be created.
Creates for the given data the needed models. Be sure to have the classes created with {@link #toClass} before calling this method.
